snippet.title: Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The teaser trailer for Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore.

Wishlist the game on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1277920/Ethyrial_Echoes_of_Yore/

Follow us on Discord & Social Media to be a part of the Development and get the latest news!
Discord - https://discord.gg/NKhE5zZ9KY
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GellyberryS
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ethyrialechoesofyore/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GellyberryTeam/

Official website - https://www.ethyrialmmo.com/
Official Wikipage - https://ethyrial.wiki.gg/wiki/Ethyrial_Wiki

Welcome to Ethyrial: Echoes of Yore, a hardcore, old-school MMORPG for players not afraid of challenge, risk, and adventure. Band together with fellow players and brave the dangers of Irumesa, bring dark secrets to light, and experience a living MMO environment brought to life entirely by players! 

#indie #indiegame #indiedev #mmorpg #oldschool
